RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

Speed.description: Speed of the movement they will travel at.

MoveRange.description: Range of the area they will move in.

AppearRange.description: Range of the area where they will appear in.

SearchRange.description: Range of the area where they will search for the player.

SearchHeight.description: Height of the area where they will search for the player.

isEventDriven.description: Are they controlled by an event?
